text: Anɨb ak chɨn mɨñɨl ñɨsɨkol paysɨkol tek ma yonɨgun, binɨb awl gɨpal okok kɨli takaw nepal tek mɨdɨl, Klays takaw ne nɨg dɨnɨgun. Klays takaw ne ned nɨgɨnok ak nep tepayaŋ agɨl tepayaŋ agɨl ma agɨnɨgayn. Chɨn Klays takaw ned nɨgɨnok ak pel nɨŋɨd lɨl nɨm, kal gɨnɨg mab meg puŋɨl tepayaŋ tɨgjuwɨl, tepayaŋ puŋɨl tepayaŋ puŋɨl gɨpun tek, kal gɨjunɨgun tek ma lup. Takaw anɨb okok apin ak, wog yokɨp gɨpun ak kelɨgɨl, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨpun takaw ak. Pen God nop gos lɨnopun takaw ak.
